channel.title: I need help anyone?
channel.description:
So i'm using an "Unlimited-pkz V3" blank Source client and i am a new person in coding family and i would appreciate if someone help me at some problems that i have in my server first of all if anyone wanna volunteer to help me just add me on msn: ricardo_10freitas@hotmail.com Well first off all im posting some pictures:[img]http://[IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/28lewap.png[/img] i wanna change that.:( Prayers [img]http://[IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/fenxxs.png[/img]
why its wildy in all server? O.o i whant wildy only in wilderness because i whant a skilling/player killing server :( [img]http://[IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/295x2z9.png[/img]
no skill capes added :( they appear as a null and i don't know how to add them [img]http://[IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/ndrm9v.png[/img] Skills are weird because to go to level 100 whips doesn't level up and skills only work doing ::master [img]http://[IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/9as0w6.png[/img] and emotes doesn't work as well and i whant to add new emotes interface

item.title: I need help anyone?
item.dc:creator: @aloninos96 aloninos96
item.description:
@aloninos96 wrote:

So i’m using an “Unlimited-pkz V3” blank Source client and i am a new person in coding family and i would appreciate if someone help me at some problems that i have in my server first of all if anyone wanna volunteer to help me just add me on msn: ricardo_10freitas@hotmail.com
Well first off all im posting some pictures: i wanna change that.
Prayers

why its wildy in all server? O.o i whant wildy only in wilderness because i whant a skilling/player killing server

no skill capes added they appear as a null and i don’t know how to add them

Skills are weird because to go to level 100 whips doesn’t level up and skills only work doing ::master

and emotes doesn’t work as well and i whant to add new emotes interface
